title: UK pushes up a law criminalizing deepfake nudes in response to Grok
summary: The UK is bringing a law into force that makes creating nonconsensual intimate deepfake images, like the ones that have proliferated on X because of the Grok AI chatbot, a criminal offense, as reported by the BBC.
